synopsis.text:
Greater galaxies are governed by the powerful Abh Empire, a civilization genetically and culturally distinct from their Earth-dwelling counterparts. Jinto, a young nobleman, finds his life uprooted when his home planet, Martine, is surrendered to the Abh by his own father in exchange for a position of nobility. As part of his new role, Jinto is sent away to learn the Abh language and culture, a future he never envisioned for himself.

His journey takes an unexpected turn when he encounters Lafiel, an enigmatic Abh princess. Despite her icy demeanor, Jinto forms a bond with her, unaware of the trials they will face together. As they embark on the next phase of Jinto's training, they are caught in the crossfire of an impending interstellar war. Thrust into a world of conflict and chaos, Jinto and Lafiel must navigate their roles in the Abh Empire and fight for their survival amidst the looming threat of war.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
